Summary: Looked like a bright low flying satellite.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lewiston
There were no other sightings in Lewiston on or around September 29th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my deck, I looked up and saw the object moving from NW to SE . I called my girlfriend to look at it also . I thought it was a satellite but it was bright and it was to low . it made no noise . This is the second time I've seen this . I observe the same thing back in june at about 6:00 pm . I've seen otherthings over the past couple of years also.
